constants.description: CSV list of values for the Dual List Box (Unofficial SF Component). These List of Top Features values are specific to Affinipay Opps.
constants.name: AffinipayProductAreasInterestValues

value.stringValue: Competition,Credit Card Processing,Cross-Sell,Expense Tracking,Integrations,Invoicing - Payments Plus,Large Processing Volume,Migration,Other Demo Area,Payments,Process Walkthrough/Understanding,Quick Bill,Reporting,Resource,Ride Along,Surcharging

constants.name: CASEpeerProductAreasInterestValues
